events.message: The insured reported their car was involved in a minor collision at a parking lot resulting in visible rear bumper damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming relevant keywords.
Claim assigned to agent Jessica Martinez who specializes in vehicle collision claims to ensure swift handling.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outline of next steps.
Requested additional documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimate.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including detailed images of the damaged car parts.
Investigation began to verify claim details and assess the extent of damage caused by the collision.
Investigation concluded confirming damages consistent with reported accident and no fraudulent activity detected.
A settlement offer was proposed for the vehicle repairs based on the repair shopâ€™s cost assessment.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer by the claimant.
Payment was issued to the repair shop as per the approved settlement amount for vehicle repairs.
The claim was formally closed after confirmation of completed repairs and customer satisfaction.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived following closure for future reference if needed.
